thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Rachel

author: Rachel
title: Rachel
text: Honestly, we have all put our names on some item or piece of clothing at some point and like me who has 2 boys. I hate the thought of digging through the lost and found. Before mabels labels I was using masking tape for school supplies which would always peel off or the marker would wear off. I absolutely love Mabels Labels they are reliable, sturdy and make labeling easy and fun for Moms and Kids. I would recommend these labels to anyone. Go out and get some. Two thumbs up!
